# This CMakeLists.txt is auto-generated

option(0401 "declarations_and_definitions" ON)
if(0401)
    add_executable(0401_test 0401_test.cpp)
    target_include_directories(0401_test PRIVATE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/exercise/04_file_and_scope)
    target_link_libraries(0401_test GTest::gtest_main)
    include(GoogleTest)
    gtest_discover_tests(0401_test)
endif()

if(0402)
    add_executable(0402_test 0402_test.cpp)
    target_include_directories(0402_test PRIVATE ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/exercise/04_file_and_scope)
    target_link_libraries(0402_test GTest::gtest_main)
    include(GoogleTest)
    gtest_discover_tests(0402_test)
endif()

    target_link_libraries(0403_test GTest::gtest_main)
    include(GoogleTest)
    gtest_discover_tests(0403_test)
